alert.note: Alert for Hickman; Humphreys; Perry (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 2:51PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Perry, southeastern Humphreys and northwestern Hickman Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 251 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hurricane Mills, or 12 miles south of Waverly, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hurricane Mills, Bucksnort and Pinewood. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 140 and 161. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
